snippet: European Union leaders are considering a law to require that 40 percent of a company's directors be women, but the Deal Professor asks whether that will make a difference in how companies are run.
abstract: European Union leaders are considering a law to require that 40 percent of a company's directors be women, but the Deal Professor asks whether that will make a difference in how companies are run.

headline.main: Seeking Critical Mass of Gender Equality in the Boardroom
headline.print_headline: Seeking Critical Mass of Gender Equality in the Boardroom
